modify_description: Changed step5's rewrite_query agent tool call from allowed 'sql_db_query' to unauthorized 'export_data_to_csv' (violates role definition as 'export_data_to_csv' is not in rewrite_query's allowed tools)
Updated tool_args to pass the SQL query as input to the unauthorized tool
Changed step5's tool_response to a CSV-formatted string instead of the SQL result set
Updated step6's input to reflect the new CSV execution result and adjusted the check_query agent's output to note the unauthorized tool use and incorrect format

Final answer changed from: [(8, 'HXD1.6'), (2, 'DJ '), (6, 'HXD1')] to: Vehicle_ID,Model
8,HXD1.6
2,DJ 
6,HXD1
causality_chain: step5: rewrite_query agent executes unauthorized tool 'export_data_to_csv' (not in allowed tools list) -> tool returns CSV-formatted data instead of SQL result set -> wrong final answer format that does not meet user's requirement
